DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure CD4-Positive T-Lymphocyte Outcome Less Than One Hundred Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether the CD4-Positive T-Lymphocyte Count is less than one hundred or greater than or equal to one hundred.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the result of the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood for CD4+ T-lymphocyte, a type of white blood cell that helps stimulate immune system reactions.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: A type of white blood cell that helps stimulate immune system reactions.  Helper T cells help activate cytotoxic T cells and macrophages by secreting cytokines. They also stimulate B cells to make antibodies.:Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

Concepts.definition: A type of white blood cell that helps stimulate immune system reactions.  Helper T cells help activate cytotoxic T cells and macrophages by secreting cytokines. They also stimulate B cells to make antibodies.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A natural number greater than ninety-nine and less than one hundred-one and the quantity that it denotes._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: A natural number greater than ninety-nine and less than one hundred-one and the quantity that it denotes.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number greater than ninety-nine and less than one hundred-one and the quantity that it denotes.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Greater Than or Equal To One Hundred

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Greater Than or Equal To One Hundred
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.: A natural number greater than ninety-nine and less than one hundred-one and the quantity that it denotes.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A natural number greater than ninety-nine and less than one hundred-one and the quantity that it denotes.
